General.Name: Korea Computer & Systems Inc
General.Description: Korea Computer & Systems Inc. operates in financial IT field in South Korea and internationally. The company is involved in the systems integration and KIOSK terminal businesses; and provision of enterprise solutions and services. It also develops railway/road traffic infrastructure solutions. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: KCS Building, Daeheung-dong, Seoul, South Korea, 121-811
